verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have set <S%H5927>up<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> their <S%H6440>face:<s%> should I be inquired of at <S%H1875>all<s%> <S%H1875><s%> by them?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them, and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> setteth <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him that <S%H935>cometh<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1544>idols;<s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> I may <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me through their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H7725>Repent,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H4480>stranger<s%> <S%H1616><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which separateth <S%H5144>himself<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> me, and setteth <S%H5927>up<s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of him concerning me; <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him by myself:

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and I will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H6601>deceived<s%> when he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> a <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H6601>deceived<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> him from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> even as the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of him that <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> unto him;

That <S%H4616><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may go <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H2930>polluted<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> but that they may <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> against me by <S%H4603>trespassing<s%> <S%H4604>grievously,<s%> then will I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> thereof, and will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon it, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it:

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> it, <S%H1992>they<s%> should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> but their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause <S%H7451>noisome<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they <S%H7921>spoil<s%> it, so that it <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> that no <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H1097><s%> may pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts: <S%H2416><s%>

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H8432>in<s%> it, as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>neither<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> they <S%H905>only<s%> shall be <S%H5337>delivered,<s%> but the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if I <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2719>Sword,<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through the <S%H776>land;<s%> so that I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it:

Though <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H8432>in<s%> it, as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> they shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> nor <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> shall be delivered <S%H5337>themselves.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if I <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it <S%H120>man<s%> and beast: <S%H929><s%>

Though <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and <S%H347>Job,<s%> were <S%H8432>in<s%> it, as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>neither<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> they shall but <S%H5337>deliver<s%> their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> How much <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H7451>noisome<s%> <S%H2416>beast,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast?<s%>

Yet, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> therein shall be <S%H3498>left<s%> a <S%H6413>remnant<s%> that shall be brought <S%H3318>forth,<s%> both <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> and ye shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> even <S%H854>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you, <S%H3588>when<s%> ye <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1870>ways<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> in it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
